column3: there is a country called Norway. It is a very cold country
column4: and very rocky; and there are a great many small islands all around it. It is on these islands that the dear little eider-ducks build their nests. They take a great deal of time and trouble to make them
column8: so as to make them as strong as they can.When the mother-duck has laid four or five eggs
column11: she plucks out some of the soft gray down that grows on her breast
column14: while she goes off to find some food.And now what do you think happens? Why
column15: when she comes back to sit on her eggs
column16: she finds that all her eggs and beautiful down have been taken away! Oh
column19: to find her darling eggs gone!
